releases.title: RISC-V GNU Tools 2025.08.08 + HTIF + PK
commands: mkdir -p $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv64-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-multilib_default && ./build-riscv-tools.sh --compress --force --setup gcc htif pk --docker ubuntu:20.04 --dest $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv64-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-multilib_default SHARED_CCACHE_DIR=$(pwd)/.ccache GNU_REF=2025.08.08 HTIF_URL=https://github.com/PhilippvK/libgloss-htif.git HTIF_REF=multilib_fix MULTILIB=true && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv64-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-multilib_default/gnu.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv64-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-multilib_default.tar.xz && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv64-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-multilib_default/htif.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//htif-multilib_default.tar.xz && mv $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//riscv64-unknown-elf-ubuntu-20.04-multilib_default/pk.tar.xz $GITHUB_WORKSPACE/upload/gcc_2025.08.08//pk-multilib_default.tar.xz
